Text: "a hallucinatory Harry Potter" -- i'm in! thanks for all of these, LeonardTSpock.
Thank you for all the new ups! Fantastic job, as always.
You're both most welcome. Glad to see you're both still here checkin' out the ups.

Maestro Spock!! Welcome back - and good to see you back with a vengeance.  Thanks especially for the Tezukas - I love the Buddha series - and the undergrounds most welcome, as ever.  Cool Basil Wolverton drop!  IT doesn't matter what he draws, always incredible. all the best.
